# The `PrettyStackTraceFormat` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/prettystacktraceformat">PrettyStackTraceFormat</a> - This object prints a string (which may use printf-style formatting but should not contain newlines) to the stream as the stack trace when a crash occurs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::PrettyStackTraceFormat</CodeBlock>
